text: Pablo Montero (August 24, 1974, Torreón, Coahuila), is a Mexican singer and actor, he has participated in soap operas produced by Televisa in different roles. Montero's main profession is Singing. == Filmography == Films Year Title Role Notes 2003 Mamá no te lo pierdas!
